long_description: The sleek profile and urban styling of the Sherpani Chelsea Cross-Body Purse transport you from work to date night with perfect ease. Medium-size bag offers an adjustable shoulder strap and magnetic closure on the front flap. Inside you'll find a floral lining and 4 credit card slots. Slash pocket on rear keeps a phone or tickets handy. Sherpani Chelsea Cross-Body Purse is made of a soft yet durable nylon/cotton blend.
short_description: The sleek profile and urban styling of the Sherpani Chelsea Cross-Body Purse transport you from work to date night with perfect ease.
